Interface NetworkService.NetworkEventReceivingListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DistributedSpace
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEventSpace, EventSpaceImpl, RestrictedAccessEventSpaceImpl, SpaceBase
    Enclosing interface:
    NetworkService

    public static interface NetworkService.NetworkEventReceivingListener
extends EventListener
    Listener on events that are received from the network.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void eventReceived(SpaceID space, Scope<?> scope, Event event)
      Invoked when a data is received from a distant peer.

    • Method Detail

      • eventReceived

        void eventReceived(SpaceID space,
                 Scope<?> scope,
                 Event event)
        Invoked when a data is received from a distant peer.
        Parameters:
        space - - the id of the space.
        scope - - the scope of the received data.
        event - - the event with the data inside.
